description: A standalone MCP service demo with three dummy shell tools.

tool_a.description: Prints a greeting for the given name.

tool_b.description: Generates a random number up to a specified maximum (default 100).

tool_c.description: Counts the number of lines in a given file.

greet_user.description: Template to greet a specific user using tool_a

random_number.description: Template to generate a random number up to 100 using tool_b
